channel.title: EV help
channel.description:
Ughh. This has been pissing me off.
K, well. I have Windows Vista 64-Bit Operating System. I've tried setting my Environmental Variables (EV for short) For A couple days now, and it's pissing me off. Nothing will work. .exe files used to work, I messed with some Variables, now NO .exe or .bat files will work whilst Trying to run my client.
Can someone tell me what my CLASSPATH and path EV's SHOULD look like? Remember, I dunno if this makes a difference, but it is windows Vista. (Tbh, Vista fails, I know). And yes, I have tried Environmental Variable setter on my computer, but it will not run.
so TY if you could help. Yes I know I am a noob.

item.title: EV help
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
